    • Uses of SWActor in starwars.actions

      Methods in starwars.actions with parameters of type SWActor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Train.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Train action increasing the SWActor's force
      void Thrown.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Thrown action by damage entity except the actors in the same team when the Thrown action performs, damage will affect up to two steps range of entities setting the item carried to null at the end since the grenade has already been used.
      void Take.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Take action by setting the item carried by the SWActor to the target ( the SWActor a's item carried would be the target of this Take).
      void Move.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Move action.
      void Leave.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Leave action by setting the item carried to null by the SWActor to the target the action Take would be added back to affordance
      void GetMoney.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the GetMoney action by adding 10 dollars in SWActor the target should be removed from affordance
      void Fill.act(SWActor a) 
      void Exit.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Exit action by exit out SWInnerWorld and appear on the SWWorld
      void Enter.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Enter action by enter into SWInnerWorld and disappear from the SWWorld
      void Dip.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Dip action and damage target 10 points of hit points
      void Buy.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Buy action that SWActor can choose things to buy if he has enough money
      void Attack.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Attack command on an entity.
      void Absorb.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Absorb action by setting the item carried by the SWActor to the target ( the SWActor a's item carried would be the target of this Absorb).
      boolean Train.canDo(SWActor a)
      Returns if or not this Train can be performed by the SWActor a.

      Returns if or not this Thrown can be performed by the SWActor a.

      Returns if or not this GetMoney can be performed by the SWActor a.
